14372.name: Recognise intellectual property
14372.text: recognise ownership over their own digital work

14384.name: Apply digital information security practices
14384.text: follow class rules about using digital information

14371.name: Apply personal security protocols
14371.text: follow class rules when sharing personal information with known audiences and demonstrate an awareness of applying social protocols when using ICT to communicate

14382.name: Identify the impacts of ICT in society
14382.text: identify how they use ICT in multiple ways on multiple devices

14398.name: Recognise intellectual property
14398.text: recognise ownership of digital products that others produce and that what they create or provide can be used or misused by others

14388.name: Apply digital information security practices
14388.text: follow class rules about applying selected standard guidelines and techniques to secure digital information

14393.name: Apply personal security protocols
14393.text: follow class guidelines when sharing personal information and apply basic social protocols when using ICT to communicate with known audiences

14389.name: Identify the impacts of ICT in society
14389.text: identify how ICT is used at home and at school

14404.name: Recognise intellectual property
14404.text: acknowledge when they use digital products created by someone else, and start to indicate the source

14403.name: Apply digital information security practices
14403.text: independently apply standard guidelines and techniques for particular digital systems to secure digital information

14408.name: Apply personal security protocols
14408.text: apply standard guidelines and take action to avoid the common dangers to personal security when using ICT and apply appropriate basic social protocols when using ICT to communicate with unknown audiences

14410.name: Identify the impacts of ICT in society
14410.text: identify the value and role of ICT use at home and school

14422.name: Recognise intellectual property
14422.text: identify the legal obligations regarding the ownership and use of digital products and apply some referencing conventions

14424.name: Apply digital information security practices
14424.text: independently apply strategies for determining and protecting the security of digital information and assess the risks associated with online environments

14426.name: Apply personal security protocols
14426.text: identify the risks to identity, privacy and emotional safety for themselves when using ICT and apply generally accepted social protocols when sharing information in online environments, taking into account different social and cultural contexts

14413.name: Identify the impacts of ICT in society
14413.text: explain the main uses of ICT at school, home and in the local community, and recognise its potential positive and negative impacts on their lives

14431.name: Recognise intellectual property
14431.text: apply practices that comply with legal obligations regarding the ownership and use of digital products resources

14430.name: Apply digital information security practices
14430.text: independently apply strategies for determining the appropriate type of digital information suited to the location of storage and adequate security for online environments

14432.name: Apply personal security protocols
14432.text: identify and value the rights to identity, privacy and emotional safety for themselves and others when using ICT and apply generally accepted social protocols when using ICT to collaborate with local and global communities

14428.name: Identify the impacts of ICT in society
14428.text: explain the benefits and risks of the use of ICT for particular people in work and home environments

14450.name: Recognise intellectual property
14450.text: identify and describe ethical dilemmas and consciously apply practices that protect intellectual property

14453.name: Apply digital information security practices
14453.text: use a range of strategies for securing and protecting information, assess the risks associated with online environments and establish appropriate security strategies and codes of conduct

14454.name: Apply personal security protocols
14454.text: independently apply appropriate strategies to protect rights, identity, privacy and emotional safety of others when using ICT, and discriminate between protocols suitable for different communication tools when collaborating with local and global communities

14451.name: Identify the impacts of ICT in society
14451.text: assess the impact of ICT in the workplace and in society, and speculate on its role in the future and how they can influence its use

14374.name: Define and plan information searches
14374.text: use ICT to identify where information is located

14380.name: Locate generate and access data and information
14380.text: use icons to locate or generate required information

14377.name: Select and evaluate data and information
14377.text: explain how located data or information was used

14394.name: Define and plan information searches
14394.text: use ICT to identify, record and classify textual and graphic information to show what is known and what needs to be investigated

14396.name: Select and evaluate data and information
14396.text: explain the usefulness of located data or information

14395.name: Locate generate and access data and information
14395.text: locate information from a given set of digital sources

14409.name: Define and plan information searches
14409.text: use ICT to plan an information search or generation of information, recognising some pattern within the information,

14407.name: Select and evaluate data and information
14407.text: explain why located data or information was selected

14401.name: Locate generate and access data and information
14401.text: locate, retrieve or generate information from a range of digital sources

14420.name: Define and plan information searches
14420.text: use a range of ICT to identify and represent patterns in sets of information and to pose questions to guide searching for, or generating, further information

14419.name: Select and evaluate data and information
14419.text: assess the suitability of data or information using a range of appropriate given criteria

14417.name: Locate generate and access data and information
14417.text: locate, retrieve or generate information using search engines and simple search functions and classify information in meaningful ways

14427.name: Define and plan information searches
14427.text: use a range of ICT to analyse information in terms of implicit patterns and structures as a basis to plan an information search or generation

14439.name: Select and evaluate data and information
14439.text: assess the suitability of data or information using appropriate own criteria

14434.name: Locate generate and access data and information
14434.text: locate, retrieve or generate information using search facilities and organise information in meaningful ways

14446.name: Define and plan information searches
14446.text: select and use a range of ICT independently and collaboratively, analyse information to frame questions and plan search strategies or data generation

14442.name: Select and evaluate data and information
14442.text: develop and use criteria systematically to evaluate the quality, suitability and credibility of located data or information and sources

14447.name: Locate generate and access data and information
14447.text: use advanced search tools and techniques or simulations and digital models to locate or generate precise data and information that supports the development of new understandings

14379.name: Generate ideas plans and processes
14379.text: use ICT to follow or contribute to a simple plan for a solution

14383.name: Generate solutions to challenges and learning area tasks
14383.text: use ICT as a creative tool to generate simple solutions, modifications or data representations for personal or school purposes

14391.name: Generate ideas plans and processes
14391.text: use ICT to prepare simple plans to find solutions or answers to questions

14392.name: Generate solutions to challenges and learning area tasks
14392.text: experiment with ICT as a creative tool to generate simple solutions, modifications or data representations for particular audiences or purposes

14412.name: Generate ideas plans and processes
14412.text: use ICT to generate ideas and plan solutions

14399.name: Generate solutions to challenges and learning area tasks
14399.text: create and modify simple digital solutions, creative outputs or data representation/transformation for particular purposes

14416.name: Generate ideas plans and processes
14416.text: use ICT effectively to record ideas, represent thinking and plan solutions

14423.name: Generate solutions to challenges and learning area tasks
14423.text: independently or collaboratively create and modify digital solutions, creative outputs or data representation/transformation for particular audiences and purposes

14433.name: Generate ideas plans and processes
14433.text: use appropriate ICT to collaboratively generate ideas and develop plans

14429.name: Generate solutions to challenges and learning area tasks
14429.text: design and modify simple digital solutions, or multimodal creative outputs or data transformations for particular audiences and purposes following recognised conventions

14452.name: Generate ideas plans and processes
14452.text: select and use ICT to articulate ideas and concepts, and plan the development of complex solutions

14449.name: Generate solutions to challenges and learning area tasks
14449.text: Design, modify and manage complex digital solutions, or multimodal creative outputs or data transformations for a range of audiences and purposes

14373.name: Collaborate share and exchange
14373.text: use purposefully selected ICT tools safely to view information shared by trusted adults

14375.name: Understand computer mediated communications
14375.text: understand that messages are recorded, viewed or sent in computer mediated communications for others to receive

14387.name: Collaborate share and exchange
14387.text: use purposefully selected ICT tools safely to share and exchange information with appropriate local audiences

14385.name: Understand computer mediated communications
14385.text: understand that computer mediated communications may be received later by the receiver

14400.name: Collaborate share and exchange
14400.text: use appropriate ICT tools safely to share and exchange information with appropriate known audiences

14405.name: Understand computer mediated communications
14405.text: understand that computer mediated communications are directed to an audience for a purpose

14415.name: Collaborate share and exchange
14415.text: select and use appropriate ICT tools safely to share and exchange information and to safely collaborate with others

14421.name: Understand computer mediated communications
14421.text: understand that particular forms of computer mediated communications and tools are suited to synchronous or asynchronous and one-to-one or group communications

14436.name: Collaborate share and exchange
14436.text: select and use appropriate ICT tools safely to lead groups in sharing and exchanging information, and taking part in online projects or active collaborations with appropriate global audiences

14440.name: Understand computer mediated communications
14440.text: understand that there are various methods of collaboration through computer mediated communications that vary in form and control

14444.name: Collaborate share and exchange
14444.text: select and use a range of ICT tools efficiently and safely to share and exchange information, and to collaboratively and purposefully construct knowledge

14441.name: Understand computer mediated communications
14441.text: understand that computer mediated communications have advantages and disadvantages in supporting active participation in a community of practice and the management of collaboration on digital materials

14378.name: Select and use hardware and software
14378.text: identify and safely operate ICT systems to complete relevant simple specified tasks and seek help when encountering a problem

14376.name: Understand ICT systems
14376.text: identify common consumer ICT systems with input and output functions

14381.name: Manage digital data
14381.text: save and retrieve digital data with support

14397.name: Select and use hardware and software
14397.text: identify and safely operate a selected range of appropriate devices, software, functions and commands when operating an ICT system and attempt to solve a problem before seeking help

14386.name: Understand ICT systems
14386.text: identify the main components of common consumer ICT systems, their fundamental functions, and describe them using basic ICT terminology

14390.name: Manage digital data
14390.text: manage and maintain digital data with guidance

14402.name: Select and use hardware and software
14402.text: identify and independently operate a range of devices, software, functions and commands, taking into consideration ergonomics when operating appropriate ICT systems, and seek solutions when encountering a problem

14411.name: Understand ICT systems
14411.text: identify and compare the use of the main components of different ICT systems

14406.name: Manage digital data
14406.text: manage and maintain digital data using common methods

14425.name: Select and use hardware and software
14425.text: select from, and safely operate, a range of devices to undertake specific tasks and use basic troubleshooting procedures to solve routine malfunctions

14418.name: Understand ICT systems
14418.text: identify, compare and classify basic ICT system components

14414.name: Manage digital data
14414.text: manage and maintain data on different storage mediums – locally and on networks

14437.name: Select and use hardware and software
14437.text: independently select and operate a range of devices by adjusting relevant software functions to suit specific tasks, and independently use common troubleshooting procedures to solve routine malfunctions

14435.name: Understand ICT systems
14435.text: identify and compare networked ICT system components including between hardware, software and data

14438.name: Manage digital data
14438.text: manage and maintain data for groups of users using a variety of methods and systems

14443.name: Select and use hardware and software
14443.text: justify the selection of, and optimise the operation of, a selected range of devices and software functions to complete specific tasks, for different purposes and in different social contexts

14445.name: Understand ICT systems
14445.text: apply an understanding of networked ICT system components to make changes to functions, processes, procedures and devices to fit the purpose of the solutions

14448.name: Manage digital data
14448.text: manage and maintain data securely in a variety of storage mediums and formats
